thread.title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series, 'The Glittering Court,' in April
thread.title_full: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series, 'The Glittering Court,' in April

title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series, 'The Glittering Court,' in April
text:
'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series, 'The Glittering Court,' in April THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   26, 2015 - 1:22 pmLast Updated: October 26, 2015 - 1:22 pm   
Subjects: Arts and entertainment (1849) 
NEW YORK â€” "Vampire Academy" author Richelle Mead is giving life to a new series. 
Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday that Mead's "The Glittering Court" will launch April 12. The publisher is calling the fantasy series "a mix of Elizabethan and frontier worlds," featuring three girls on a "search of empowerment and love." 
Mead's previous series also include "Bloodlines," ''Georgina Kincaid" and "Dark Swan." 
Online:
